SEARCH
Module com.example.nouveau
Package com.example.nouveau

Class Case

java.lang.Object
com.example.nouveau.Case
public class Case extends Object
The class Case represents a cell in a maze. Each cell has walls (north, east, south, west) that can be present or absent, as well as information about its position, unique identifier, and visit status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Case

      public Case(int x, int y)
      Constructor for a cell at the given position. All walls are initially present.
      Parameters:
      x - Vertical coordinate of the cell.
      y - Horizontal coordinate of the cell.
